result.markdown: --- title: "Generalized linear models" --- ### Content ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} |S |Content | PDF | Videos | SAS | R | |:--|:------------------------------|:--------------------------------------------------------------------------:|:---------------------------------------------------------------------:|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------:|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------:| |4a |Generalized linear models |[](https://lbelzile.github.io/MATH60604A-slides/MATH60604A_w4a_glm.pdf)|[](https://youtu.be/Ru9OXJTsToY)|[](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lbelzile/statmod/main/code/MATH60604A_4a_glm.sas)|[](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lbelzile/statmod/main/code/MATH60604A_4a_glm.R)| |4b |Logistic regression |[](https://lbelzile.github.io/MATH60604A-slides/MATH60604A_w4b_logistic.pdf)|[](https://youtu.be/MabdSIYexmg)| | | |4c |Example of logistic regression |[](https://lbelzile.github.io/MATH60604A-slides/MATH60604A_w4c_logistic_example.pdf)|[](https://youtu.be/oGFsv1eBl6Y)|[](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lbelzile/statmod/main/code/MATH60604A_4c_logistic_example.sas)|[](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lbelzile/statmod/main/code/MATH60604A_4c_logistic_example.R)| ::: ::: - Course notes: Sections 2.10, 4.1-4.2 ### In class: - Overview of the theory of generalized linear models. - [Example of Box-Cox regression](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lbelzile/statmod/main/code/60604A_BoxCox.sas) - Midterm survey.
